page.title: 18Religion near Tregony
page.content: The average age of congregation is over forty years.This includes younger age groups which accasionally attend the services. Many people just use the church for getting babtised,married and buried.The number of children the church baptises varies from four to twelve.Also there are about three or four weddings a year.The congregation ranges from four people to eighteen.The church is very important to the village,every five years the church is checked but at the moment the building is very sound.In an average day the church would either be holding a service or doing nothing but for ten days in every month it would be compiling the village magazine{ 'Roseland'.When the church is not doing anything it is left open for visitors.
